Rulings.Edison:
●If you have 2 copies of Cave Dragon on the field, they can both attack.
●You can still Set, Flip Summon, and Special Summon Cave Dragon if there is another monster on your side of the field.
Rulings.Tengu:
●If you have 2 copies of Cave Dragon on the field, they can both attack.
●You can still Set, Flip Summon, and Special Summon Cave Dragon if there is another monster on your side of the field.
Rulings.Goat:
●If you have 2 copies of Cave Dragon on the field, they can both attack.
●You can still Set, Flip Summon, and Special Summon Cave Dragon if there is another monster on your side of the field.
●If the only other Dragon monster on the field is destroyed as a response to “Cave Dragon” declaring an attack, the “Cave Dragon’s attack is stopped. 
●If “Skill Drain” is applying on the field, “Cave Dragon” may still not be Normal Summoned if there are any other monsters on the field. If “Skill Drain” is applying on the field, “Cave Dragon” may attack even if there are no other Dragons on the field.
